items.sentence: Tom plays the guitar almost as well as Mary does.
Frankly speaking, I don\'t want to work with him.
Let\'s get our bearings before we go any further.
Let\'s not do anything that might make Tom angry.
Let\'s try to find out what Tom expects us to do.
If I were you, I would apply for the scholarship.
Tom said he didn\'t have any idea where Mary was.
Tom seems to be able to speak French fairly well.
Tom seems to be unwilling to be a suicide bomber.
Tom seems to complain about everything Mary does.
